Harga Emas Antam Turun Goceng Jadi Rp 758.000/Gram
05 Nov 2019, 02:30 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Foto: Pradita Utama

Jakarta - Harga emas batangan milik PT Aneka Tambang Tbk (Antam) hari ini turun Rp 5.000 alias goceng. Artinya harga emas Antam berada di Rp 758.000/gram.Demikian dikutip detikcom dari situs perdagangan Logam Mulia Antam, Selasa (5/11/2019).Sementara itu, harga buyback atau pembelian kembali emas Antam juga turun goceng di level Rp 678.000/gram. Harga buyback ini berarti, jika Anda ingin menjual emas, maka Antam akan membelinya dengan harga tersebut.Harga emas batangan tersebut sudah termasuk PPh 22 sebesar 0,9%. Bila ingin mendapatkan potongan pajak lebih rendah, yaitu sebesar 0,45% maka bawa NPWP saat transaksi.Berikut rincian harga emas Antam hari ini:

Pecahan 1 gram Rp 758.000
Pecahan 5 gram Rp 3.610.000
Pecahan 10 gram Rp 7.155.000
Pecahan 25 gram Rp 17.780.000
Pecahan 50 gram Rp 35.485.000
Pecahan 100 gram Rp 70.900.000
Pecahan 250 gram Rp 177.000.000
Pecahan 500 gram Rp 353.800.000

Antam's Gold Price Declines to Get Rid of Rp. 758,000 / Gram
05 Nov 2019, 02:30 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Photo: Pradita Utama

Jakarta - The price of gold bars owned by PT Aneka Tambang Tbk (Antam) today dropped by Rp 5,000, aka goceng. This means that Antam's gold price is at Rp 758,000 / gram. Thus quoted from the Antam Precious Metals trading site, Tuesday (11/05/2019). Meanwhile, the buyback price or the buyback of Antam's gold also fell off at the level of Rp 678,000 / gram. This buyback price means, if you want to sell gold, then Antam will buy it at that price. The price of the gold bar includes PPh 22 of 0.9%. If you want to get a lower tax cut, which is equal to 0.45%, then bring your NPWP during the transaction. Here are Antam's gold price details today:

Fraction of 1 gram IDR 758,000
5 gram fraction Rp. 3,610,000
10 gram fraction of Rp. 7,155,000
The 25 gram fraction is Rp. 17,780,000
50 gram fraction of Rp. 35,485,000
100 gram fraction of Rp. 70,900,000
250 gram fraction Rp 177,000,000
500 gram fraction of Rp 353,800,000
